segments.text: I'm observing the two children, and their scheme is quite clever.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is using a stool to reach the cookies, that's resourceful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's even using a plate to catch them, which is a smart move.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is right there, ready to participate in their secret snack.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: However, that stool looks extremely wobbly beneath him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can clearly see its legs are splayed out, making it very unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He could easily lose his balance and tumble backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of him falling and possibly getting hurt is quite worrying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But they look so delighted with their plan.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their stealthy operation is quite amusing to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just wish they had a more secure way to get those treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Despite the danger, their teamwork is really something.
segments.speaker: PAR
